name: GOT DEAD POOL
description:
Fanmade Game Of Thrones Dead Pool

#GoTDeadPool  Try to guess who dies in the final season of Game of Thrones   https://rixud.itch.io/got-dead-pool  #GameofThrones #GoTS8 #GOT

Share your results in social media  (Android Share Button Available)

WebGL Results Screenshot need to be taken manually

APK for Android can be blocked by PlayStore, go to Play Store > Menu > Play Protect > Disable
